pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Den-O & Kiva: Climax Cop (2008, movie)$(br2)Spawns throughout the Sands of Time$(br2)Chest loot:$(li)1 $(l:den_o/items/rider_tickets#rider_ticket_nega)Rider Ticket Negataros$(/l)$(li)4-6 $(l:den_o/items/imagin_sand)Imagin Sand$(/l) (16%)$(li)3-7 $(l:den_o/items/rider_tickets#rider_ticket)Rider Tickets$(/l) (53%)$(li)1 $(l:den_o/items/rider_tickets#rider_ticket_nega)Rider Ticket Negataros$(/l) (31%)
